short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Correct NHL team abbreviations on demand.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the correct abbreviations for NHL teams. Includes corrections for the most commonly misused abbreviations, including CAL for Calgary and CLB for Columbus.
